title: Patient-Reported Outcomes in Older Adults With Transthyretin Amyloid Cardiomyopathy - JACC

summary.text: **KEY FINDING**: EQ-5D-5 L and MLHFQ predictive of all-cause mortality in ATTR-CM patients.
**TACTICAL WIN [SHIP NOW]**: Integrate auto-reminders to improve PRO completion rates in trials.
**MARKET SIGNAL [ðŸ”´ URGENT]**: FDA prioritizing PRO data for faster approval in heart failure and amyloid cardiomyopathy trials.
**CONCERN**: Self-selection bias may limit clinical validity of patient-reported outcomes.
